statements: SELECT * FROM SalaryInformation;
SELECT employee_id, salary FROM SalaryInformation;
SELECT employee_id, bonus, benefits FROM SalaryInformation;
SELECT salary, bonus, benefits FROM SalaryInformation ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalaryInformation WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT * FROM SalaryInformation WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY salary DESC
SELECT employee_id, salary, bonus FROM SalaryInformation WHERE bonus > 1000
SELECT AVG(salary) AS average_salary FROM SalaryInformation
SELECT * FROM SalaryInformation WHERE benefits LIKE '%health%'
SELECT * FROM SalaryInformation WHERE salary >= 60000 AND bonus < 5000 ORDER BY employee_id ASC
SELECT * FROM SalaryInformation;
SELECT employee_name, salary_amount FROM SalaryInformation WHERE id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, salary_amount FROM SalaryInformation WHERE salary_amount > 50000;
SELECT employee_name, SUM(salary_amount) AS total_salary FROM SalaryInformation GROUP BY employee_name;
SELECT employee_name, bonus_amount FROM SalaryInformation JOIN Bonuses ON SalaryInformation.id = Bonuses.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM SalaryInformation WHERE salary_amount > 50000 ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, salary_amount FROM SalaryInformation WHERE employee_name LIKE 'A%' AND salary_amount < 60000;
SELECT employee_name, bonus_amount FROM SalaryInformation JOIN Bonuses ON SalaryInformation.id = Bonuses.employee_id ORDER BY bonus_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_name FROM SalaryInformation WHERE salary_amount BETWEEN 40000 AND 80000;
SELECT AVG(salary_amount) AS average_salary FROM SalaryInformation GROUP BY employee_name HAVING AVG(salary_amount) > 60000;
SELECT * FROM SalaryInformation;
SELECT employee_id, salary FROM SalaryInformation WHERE currency='USD';
SELECT employee_id, bonus_amount, bonus_reason, bonus_date FROM Bonuses ORDER BY bonus_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, benefit_type, provider_name FROM Benefits ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT employee_id, salary, hire_date FROM SalaryInformation WHERE salary > 5000;
SELECT employee_id, salary, currency, hire_date FROM SalaryInformation WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT DISTINCT bonus_reason, bonus_date FROM Bonuses WHERE bonus_amount > 1000;
SELECT employee_id, MAX(salary) AS max_salary, MIN(salary) AS min_salary FROM SalaryInformation GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT employee_id, benefit_type, coverage, provider_name FROM Benefits ORDER BY benefit_type DESC, provider_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, bonus_amount, bonus_reason, bonus_date FROM Bonuses WHERE bonus_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM SalaryInformation;
SELECT employee_id, salary FROM SalaryInformation ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT employee_id, pay_period FROM SalaryInformation WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT DISTINCT bonus_type FROM BonusesData;
SELECT employee_id, total_compensation AS total_pay FROM PayrollProcessing;
SELECT * FROM SalaryInformation WHERE employee_id = 1001
SELECT employee_id, salary, pay_period FROM SalaryInformation ORDER BY salary DESC
SELECT * FROM SalaryInformation WHERE salary > 5000 AND pay_period = 'Monthly'
SELECT employee_id, total_compensation FROM PayrollProcessing ORDER BY total_compensation ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM BenefitsData WHERE benefit_type = 'Healthcare' AND benefit_name LIKE '%insurance%'
SELECT * FROM salary_info
SELECT employee_id, salary_amount, salary_date FROM salary_info WHERE currency = 'USD'
SELECT * FROM bonuses ORDER BY bonus_date DESC
SELECT employee_id, bonus_amount, bonus_date FROM bonuses WHERE employee_id = 101
SELECT benefit_id, benefit_type FROM benefits
SELECT * FROM salary_info ORDER BY employee_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT employee_id, payment_amount, payment_status FROM payroll_processing WHERE payment_status = 'pending' AND payment_amount > 5000;
SELECT employee_id, bonus_amount, bonus_date FROM bonuses WHERE bonus_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY bonus_amount DESC;
SELECT benefit_id, employee_id, benefit_type FROM benefits WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY benefit_id ASC;
SELECT employee_id, salary_amount, currency, salary_date FROM salary_info WHERE currency = 'USD' ORDER BY salary_date DESC, salary_amount ASC;
